description: Numbers n such that decimal expansion of n^2 contains n as a substring.
links: David W. Wilson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..126
mathematica: Select[Range[510000], MemberQ[FromDigits /@ Partition[IntegerDigits[#^2], IntegerLength[#], 1], #] &] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jun 29 2013 *)
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (isInfixOf)a018834 n = a018834_list !! (n-1)a018834_list = filter (\x -> show x `isInfixOf` show (x^2)) [0..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 27 2011
author: _David W. Wilson_
